description: standing figure wearing long jacket with wide cuffs and knickers, with medium-length curly hair and a large nose, with hands in his pants pockets; very light, illegible inscription above figure's head
medium: Pen and gray wash on laid paper
provenance: [Shepherd Gallery, The Drawing Shop, New York, until 1973; sold, June 12, for $350, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1973-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Caricature of George Michael Moser (?)
